post:
TragicServers is a game and voice server provider founded in May 2012 with a goal to provide high-end customer support, quality and lowest pricing possible. We’re proud to host and satisfy over 500+ customers across the US and EU. Currently, we provide game servers in Chicago, Dallas, San Jose, New York, and Frankfurt along with voice servers in Chicago, Buffalo, and Frankfurt.

After more than a year of quality service, we’re now expanding our services to include VPS hosting. VPS servers are perfect for those who run many online services (such as web-sites and voice servers) and wish to have complete control over their machine for a budget price.

As of right now, we currently have our VPS services located in Dallas with the following features:

  • Unmanaged Service
  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • Upgradable RAM/HDD space
  • Additional IPv4 addresses available
  • Multiple OS Installations (CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, etc.)
  • VSwap
  • Instant Setup

We currently have the following options and price points for our services:

Basic ($2.50 USD):
  • 128MB Guaranteed RAM
  • 128MB VSwap
  • 1 CPU Core @ 2.4Ghz+
  • 10GB HD space
  • 100GB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4 Address
  • TUN/TAP
Entry ($5.00 USD):
  • 256MB Guaranteed RAM
  • 256MB VSwap
  • 2 CPU Core @ 2.4Ghz+
  • 15GB HD space
  • 200GB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4 Address
  • TUN/TAP
Mid ($7.50 USD):
  • 512MB Guaranteed RAM
  • 512MB VSwap
  • 2 CPU Cores @ 2.4Ghz+
  • 25GB HD space
  • 400GB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4 Address
  • TUN/TAP
High ($10.00 USD):
  • 1024MB Guaranteed RAM
  • 1024MB VSwap
  • 3 CPU Cores @ 2.4Ghz+
  • 50GB HD space
  • 700GB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4 Address
  • TUN/TAP
Order Now

As we grow our business as well as our community, we will continue to introduce new features and plans, as well as new locations to cater to our increasing userbase’s needs.So come check us out at https://www.tragicservers.com today and order yourself a new VPS server today!
